TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FUNCKIND extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines how to access a function.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For additional information about `FUNCKIND`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FUNCKIND FUNC_DISPATCH = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The function can be accessed only through .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FUNCKIND FUNC_NONVIRTUAL = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The function is accessed by address and takes an implicit pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FUNCKIND FUNC_PUREVIRTUAL = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The function is accessed through the virtual function table (VTBL), and takes an implicit pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FUNCKIND FUNC_STATIC = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The function is accessed by address and does not take an implicit pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FUNCKIND FUNC_VIRTUAL = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The function is accessed in the same way as , except the function has an implementation.
